Job Title: Director, Finance Integration

Location: Mission, KS

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Business Development, Other

Description:
At ACERTUS culture is everything. We want people to want to work here. We have weekly huddles to hear from our team on how we can improve. And guess what? We act on your ideas!ACERTUS is an automotive logistics company that offers a portfolio of services that span across the vehicle lifecycle. As a Director of Finance Integration, You will plan, analyze, report, and communicate as related to the Financial Integration of Acquired Organizations. Apply advanced analysis, insight, influence and challenge, through a “financial set of glasses”; to enhance the quality of business decision-making and drive improved performance.
Schedule: Monday through Friday
Pay: Based on Experience
Must be willing and able to travel 25%
 What will you be doing?Prepare and distribute Acquisition Plans and progress leadership to identify improvements and subsequent implementation.Proactively identify synergies and cost savings opportunitiesCollaborate with Product & technology, operations, and sales to integrate acquired organizations financial transactions according to the proper accounting methodology.Develop tools to deliver various company analysis.Develop and manage process maps.Coordinate people and training to communicate and deliver business measures.Analyze fiscal and operational data to assist with financial, capital and workforce planning.Ensure accuracy and timeliness of entry for accounting transactions, source documents and records.Prepare financial reports and ad-hoc reports for operational decision making.Ensure adherence to financial and operational controls.Personal responsibility to manage change.
What are we looking for?Bachelor's or equivalent combination of education and/or experience required.10 years of experience in Accounting/Financial leadership role.Experience with Business AcquisitionGood verbal and written communication skills.Detail-oriented with strong organizational skills.Intermediate experience with Microsoft Office SuiteAbility to interpret user needs and translate into system requirements.Ability to understand system data and to identify discrepancies.Skilled in problem solving.Ability to effectively organize and prioritize work as well as concentrate on multiple tasks simultaneously.Ability to analyze spreadsheets and reports.

Benefits:At ACERTUS we believe that our employees are our greatest asset. Our benefits include:Medical, Dental and Vision Insurance benefits start on the 1st of the month following your start date.Company Paid Time Off8 Company Paid Holidays401(k) with auto-enrollment at 3% on the 1st of the month following your start date.Casual Dress Code
About ACERTUSACERTUS is an automotive logistics company specializing in vehicle lifecycle solutions. Our client centric model is enabled by our people, processes and innovative technology that are a differentiator in the industry. Our comprehensive portfolio of services is designed to provide solutions throughout the lifecycle of a vehicle. We offer a full suite of vehicle transportation services, customizable technology, a national title and registration platform plus compliance services, and a growing vehicle storage footprint throughout North America. ACERTUS – Relentless Drive to Deliver!
ACERTUS is committed to employing a diverse workforce. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
